metadataAttributes.Title: Reducing Gun Violence in America: Evidence for Change
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Reducing Gun Violence in America: Evidence for Change is designed to provide learners with the best available science and insights from top scholars across the country as well as the skills to understand which interventions are the most effective to offer a path forward for reducing gun violence in our homes, schools, and communities.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Gun Violence Epidemiology,Community Change,Public Health Interventions,American Law & Policy,
